title: Fake Quote Claims Shabana Azmi Said, 'If Modi Wins This Time I'll Leave The Country'
subtitle: Fake quotes attributed to Bollywood actors critical of the government have increased since May 23, 2019.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Shabana Azmi had said, "This time also if Modi Wins I'll Leave The Country".

This is a fake quote attributed to the veteran actor. Azmi had taken to Twitter earlier this month rubbishing this fake quote attributed to her. A similar fake quote was attributed to Javed Akhtar which was debunked by BOOM.
